import {Fragment, useEffect, useState} from "react" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import {useParams} from "react-router-dom" const UpdateEntry = () => { const params = useParams() const {id} = params const entry = useSelector(state => state.entries.find(data => data._id === id)) return

{entry.title}

/* return (

) */ } export default UpdateEntry
